description: This table contains information relating to the Administrative Reference Number (REF) segment on the service line level.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.  Each instance of claim remit information will have its own line.

columns.name: REF_SVC_LN
columns.description: This is the service line for reference segment.

columns.name: SVC_REF_ID_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the service line level reference segment ID qualifier.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Group or policy number


Member identification number


Repriced claim reference number


Adjusted repriced claim reference number


Employee identification number 4010


Authorization number


Class of contract code


Medical record identification number


Original reference number


Prior authorization number

Insurance policy number


Social security number


Blue cross provider number


Blue shield provider number


Medicare provider number


Medicaid provider number


Provider UPIN number


Tricare Identification Number


National association of boards of pharmacy number


Provider commercial number


Ambulatory patient group (APG) number


Provider control number


Attachment code


Location number


Rate code number


Facility ID number


Health care financing administration national provider identifier


Federal taxpayer's identification number


Employee Identification Number


Group Number


State Licence Number


Ambulatory Payment Classification


Policy Form Identifying Number


Supplemental Remittance Information

columns.name: SVC_REF_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This is the service line level reference segment Identifier.
